patthana8.3:1.1_0: Nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.3:1.1_1: Nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.3:1.1_2: Nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā
patthana8.3:2.1_0: Nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.3:2.1_1: Nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.3:2.1_2: Nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā
patthana8.3:3.1: Nahetusampayuttañca nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.3:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
